Pre-Game Insights: Pedro Goncalves's men ended with seven points, setting a new record for the southern African side, who had never secured more than one win at previous editions.
Namibia secured their place in Saturday's game as one of the best third-placed sides, with a historic victory over Tunisia and a clean sheet in their final group match against Mali.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Angola topped Group D against pre-tournament predictions.
Namibia's Deon Hotto scored an 88th-minute winner against Tunisia in their tournament opener.
Peter Shalulile, Namibia's captain, has failed to sparkle at the finals against superior opponents.
Angola have multiple sources of goalscoring prowess in a goal-laden tournament, with six strikes matching their tally from previous editions combined.
